# PED::SET_SCENARIO_PEDS_TO_BE_RETURNED_BY_NEXT_COMMAND

## Summary
Call this with TRUE before GET_CLOSEST_PED or GET_RANDOM_PED_AT_COORD if you want scenario peds to be checked too

## Parameters
* **BOOL** allowScenarioPedsToBeGrabbed:
The default value for this flag is FALSE.
It will be reset to FALSE automatically by both of those GET_..._PED commands once they have checked all peds.

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Sets a value indicating whether scenario peds should be returned by the next call to a command that returns peds. Eg. GET_CLOSEST_PED.
